headers.alertMsg: A trading agreement is a contract between you and your customer ‚úçÔ∏è If you have to carry out a task over a longer period of time, typically more than 14 days, we recommend that you make a trading agreement. If you have questions about trading agreements, write to us on the chat üëá

labels.openEnded: Is this an open ended task?

descriptions.terminationAgreement: If it is a continuous collaboration or it must be possible to terminate along the way, describe what has been agreed regarding termination. It can e.g. be day to day notice, current month, to the first of a month, etc.
descriptions.equipmentSupplied: Has your customer provided equipment or extra assistance?
descriptions.specialConditions: Agree on a minimum number of hours, maximum price, bonus, performance terms, etc. Describe it as clearly as possible.
descriptions.priceDetails: If a fixed price has been agreed for the task. So what is the agreement if the customer wants things that are not part of the original description. Is it free, It is invoiced per. hour, new offer with fixed price, etc.

messages.createAs: You are creating this cooperation agreement as {{- displayName}}

paymentTypes.FIXED: Total fixed payment for the task/period

extraWorkNotifications.WRITTEN_ESTIMATE: Written on the basis of an estimate
extraWorkNotifications.WRITTEN_FIXED: Written on the basis of a fixed offer
